arguments.argument: plusposition = string_pos('+',keyboard_string) string_part[1] = string_copy(keyboard_string,0,plusposition - 1) string_part[2] = string_copy(keyboard_string,plusposition+1,10) show_message(string_part[1]+'+'+string_part[2]) solution = real(string_part[1])+real(string_part[2]) keyboard_string = ''
